metadata.description: One day, a super-average second-year high school student who wants a girlfriend, Aoshima, suddenly awakens to the ability to time slip. Ten years in the future, he is—gasp—married to the cutest girl in school, Wagatsuma-san! In the present, they are only classmates, so how in the world does he end up with the unobtainable Wagatsuma-san?! A time-slipping romcom coming at you from a brand-spanking-new duo!
metadata.name: My Wife is Wagatsuma-san
